string-array.name: news_headlines
string-array.item: Two brooms are getting married. Before the ceremony, the bride broom says to the groom broom, "I think I'm going to have a whisk." The groom broom says, How can that be possible? We havent even swept together!"

A man cheats on his girlfriend named Lorraine with a girl named Clearly.
Suddenly, Lorraine died.
At the funeral, the man stands up and sings, I can see Clearly now, Lorraine is gone.

Q: What is the difference between a girlfriend and a wife?
A: 45 lbs.
Q: What is the difference between a boyfriend and a husband?
A: 45 minutes.

Q: What is the difference between a divorce and a circumcision?
A: In a divorce, you get rid of the whole schmuck.
